data_table.description: MRI Report Referral Form, Visit 5. Participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: SUBJECT_ID
variable.description: ARIC subject ID [MRI Report Referral Form], Exam 5

variable.name: MRR2
variable.description: Reason for Report and Referral. Q2. Immediate MRI alert [MRI Report Referral Form], Exam 5

variable.name: MRR2A
variable.description: Reason for Report and Referral. Q2a. MRI acute hemispheric cerebral infarction [MRI Report Referral Form], Exam 5

variable.name: MRR2B
variable.description: Reason for Report and Referral. Q2b.MRI significant space occupying lesion [MRI Report Referral Form], Exam 5

variable.name: MRR2C
variable.description: Reason for Report and Referral. Q2c. MRI acute subdural or epidural hematoma [MRI Report Referral Form], Exam 5

variable.name: MRR2D
variable.description: Reason for Report and Referral. Q2d. MRI subarachnoid hemorrhage [MRI Report Referral Form], Exam 5

variable.name: MRR2E
variable.description: Reason for Report and Referral. Q2e. MRI acute intraparenchymal hematoma [MRI Report Referral Form], Exam 5

variable.name: MRR2F
variable.description: Reason for Report and Referral. Q2f. MRI acute infarct [MRI Report Referral Form], Exam 5

variable.name: MRR2G
variable.description: Reason for Report and Referral. Q2g. MRI abscess [MRI Report Referral Form], Exam 5

variable.name: MRR2H
variable.description: Reason for Report and Referral. Q2h. MRI obstructive hydrocephalus [MRI Report Referral Form], Exam 5

variable.name: MRR3
variable.description: Reason for Report and Referral. Q3. Physician notification recommended of MRI result [MRI Report Referral Form], Exam 5

variable.name: MRR3A
variable.description: Reason for Report and Referral. Q3a. MRI subacute infarct [MRI Report Referral Form], Exam 5

variable.name: MRR3B
variable.description: Reason for Report and Referral. Q3b. MRI AV malformation [MRI Report Referral Form], Exam 5

variable.name: MRR3C
variable.description: Reason for Report and Referral. Q3c. MRI benign tumor with no mass Effect [MRI Report Referral Form], Exam 5

variable.name: MRR3D
variable.description: Reason for Report and Referral. Q3d. MRI communicating hydrocephalus [MRI Report Referral Form], Exam 5

variable.name: MRR3E
variable.description: Reason for Report and Referral. Q3e. MRI aneurysm [MRI Report Referral Form], Exam 5

variable.name: MRR4
variable.description: Reason for Report and Referral. Q4. Routine notification - minor or chronic MRI result [MRI Report Referral Form], Exam 5

variable.name: MRR4A
variable.description: Reason for Report and Referral. Q4a. MRI old infarct [MRI Report Referral Form], Exam 5

variable.name: MRR4B
variable.description: Reason for Report and Referral. Q4b. MRI lacunar infarcts [MRI Report Referral Form], Exam 5

variable.name: MRR4C
variable.description: Reason for Report and Referral. Q4c. MRI microhemorrhage [MRI Report Referral Form], Exam 5

variable.name: MRR5
variable.description: Reason for Report and Referral. Q5. Routine notification - normal MRI [MRI Report Referral Form], Exam 5

variable.name: MRR5A
variable.description: Reason for Report and Referral. Q5a. MRI white matter ischemia [MRI Report Referral Form], Exam 5

variable.name: MRR5B
variable.description: Reason for Report and Referral. Q5b MRI atrophy [MRI Report Referral Form], Exam 5

variable.name: MRR6
variable.description: Reason for Report and Referral. Q6. Other MRI result [MRI Report Referral Form], Exam 5

variable.name: MRR6A
variable.description: Reason for Report and Referral. Q6a. Other MRI result: immediate alerts [MRI Report Referral Form], Exam 5

variable.name: MRR6B
variable.description: Reason for Report and Referral. Q6b. Other MRI result: physician notification recommended [MRI Report Referral Form], Exam 5

variable.name: MRR6C
variable.description: Reason for Report and Referral. Q6c. Exam 5 Other MRI result: routine notification - minor or chronic [MRI Report Referral Form], Exam 5

variable.name: MRR6D
variable.description: Reason for Report and Referral. Q6d. Other MRI result: routine notification - normal [MRI Report Referral Form], Exam 5

variable.name: MRR1Y
variable.description: Administrative Information. Q1. Year of scan date [MRI Report Referral Form], Exam 5
